summary: VEHICLE OPTIONS (TOYOTA 4RUNNER 2003 - SPORT PACKAGE) INDICATES VEHICLE SHOULD HAVE COME WITH VANITY MIRRORS IN THE SUN VISORS.  OTHER SPORT MODELS HAVE THESE MIRRORS.  MY VEHICLE DOES NOT.  TOYOTA STATES THAT THEY ARE AWARE OF THE PROBLEM.  OFFERED A $10.00 AMERICAN EXPRESS GIFT CHECK FOR MY INCONVENIENCE.  I DECLINED, IN PREFERANCE OF A PROPER REMEMDY SUCH AS REPLACING THE VISORS WITH FACTORY COMPONENTS.  ALSO, REAR BRAKES SQUEEL EVERY TIME IT RAINS.   FUEL ECONOMY INDICATOR DOES NOT ACCURATELY REFLECT ACTUAL MPG.  ERROR OF 2-5 MPG PER TANK.
